Uses of Package
events

Packages that use events 
Package Description
cli
Contains the command line version of this game.
events
Contains all the random events
gui
Contains all the GUI classes and modules
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
main
Core package - Contains all the important classes that can't be categorized
  • Classes in events used by cli 
    Class Description
    PirateAttack
    Random event representing a pirate attack.
    Rescue
    A random event representing rescuing sailors.
    Weather
    Random event representing poor weather.
  • Classes in events used by events 
    Class Description
    PirateOutcome
    Represents the outcome of a pirate attack.
    RandomEvent
    An abstract base class for random events that players can encounter when moving between islands.
  • Classes in events used by gui 
    Class Description
    PirateAttack
    Random event representing a pirate attack.
    RandomEvent
    An abstract base class for random events that players can encounter when moving between islands.
  • Classes in events used by islands 
    Class Description
    RandomEvent
    An abstract base class for random events that players can encounter when moving between islands.
  • Classes in events used by main 
    Class Description
    RandomEvent
    An abstract base class for random events that players can encounter when moving between islands.
